definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: The motives of the female offenders concerned drugs shows diversity.
sentences.chinese: 涉毒女犯的犯罪动机多样化。

sentences.english: Guards also sexually abused female prisoners according to the white paper.
sentences.chinese: 根据白皮书所说，监狱卫兵还对女犯人进行性侵犯。

sentences.english: The coroner gives a look of encouragement to the juror and the accused girl wails.
sentences.chinese: 但验尸官给了狄更斯和哭号的女犯一个鼓励的眼神。

sentences.english: They have committed no crime, but they live among the country's 304 incarcerated women.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有犯罪，但他们在该国的304女犯生活。

sentences.english: Information on the number of women and juvenile prisoners was not available.
sentences.chinese: 关于女犯人和儿童犯的信息无法获知。

definition: prisoner that awaits execution/convict sentenced to death/someone on death row
beating with wooden staves (as corporal punishment)
person being executed/victim of corporal punishment/person serving a sentence
